Mary_Duff:
{{short description|Irish country, pop and folk singer|bot=PearBOT 5}} {{Use dmy dates|date=February 2020}} {{for|the English tragedienne|Mary Ann Duff}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Mary Duff | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1964|07|19}} | birth_place = [[County Meath|Meath]], Ireland | occupation = Musician | genre = [[Country music|Country]]
[[Folk music|folk]] | years_active = 1987–present | label = | associated_acts = [[Daniel O'Donnell]] | spouse = Paul McKenna (divorced) | website = {{url|maryduffmusic.com/}} }} '''Mary Duff''' is an Irish [[Country music|country]], pop and folk singer. Duff’s rise to fame began in the 1990s when she was discovered by Irish singer [[Daniel O'Donnell]]. O'Donnell invited her to perform with him on his television show, and the rest, as they say, is history. Duff became a regular on the show and soon began touring with Daniel. She quickly gained a reputation as one of the most talented singers in Ireland, and her popularity began to grow beyond the country’s borders.{{Cite web |date=2023-06-07 |title=When was Irish singer Mary Duff born? - TravelAsker |url=https://travelasker.com/when-was-irish-singer-mary-duff-born/ |access-date=2024-04-06 |language=en-US}} Duff and O'Donnell parted ways as duo in 2019. Duff is quoted saying on the topic, "I wanted to experiment more with songs and do a wider variety of songs, not necessarily ones that would have suited his audience."{{Cite web |last=Walsh |first=Kayla |date=2021-02-11 |title=Mary Duff says people have accused her of having an affair with Daniel O'Donnell |url=https://www.rsvplive.ie/news/celebs/country-singer-mary-duff-says-23486409 |access-date=2024-04-06 |website=RSVP Live |language=en}} ==Personal life== Mary Duff is a private person and keeps her personal life out of the public eye. Mary was married to her manager, Paul McKenna. They are now divorced.http://www.authorsden.com/visit/viewArticle.asp?id=18870{{dead link|date=June 2017 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }} They have two children together. Mary is also a devout Catholic and is known for her strong faith.{{Cite web |date=2023-06-07 |title=When was Irish singer Mary Duff born? - TravelAsker |url=https://travelasker.com/when-was-irish-singer-mary-duff-born/ |access-date=2024-04-06 |language=en-US}} ==Discography== === Studio albums === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of studio albums, with selected chart positions and certifications ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:20em;"| Album details ! scope="col" colspan="2"| Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:12em;"| [[List of music recording certifications|Certifications]] |- !
